meanings.definition: Deposit (an object) with a pawnbroker as security for money lent.
meanings.sent1: He pawned his watch to borrow some cash.
meanings.sent2: She pawned her necklace to get a loan for her car.
meanings.sent3: The man pawned his guitar to buy a new one, but ended up missing his old one.
meanings.sent4: She pawned her wedding ring, trading its sentimental value for temporary financial relief.
meanings.sent5: The young man pawned his laptop, exchanging it for much-needed money.
